name: Zurich Insurance Company Ltd
goal: Zurich is a leading multi-line insurance provider with a global network of subsidiaries and offices. With about 55,000 employees, we deliver a wide range of general insurance and life insurance products and services for individuals, small businesses, and mid-sized and large companies, including multinational corporations, in more than 170 countries.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
